title: Application Portfolio Management roles and permissions
content:
There are specific roles associated with Application Portfolio Management. Service Management uses role-based permissions to enable you to complete a task that's appropriate to your role. The tenant administrator manages and assigns these permissions.

By default, the following roles are related to the Application Portfolio Management module.

Role Responsibilities
Application Owner
  • Creates and updates applications
  • Manages the application workflow
  • Creates, updates, and deletes roadmaps
  • Creates, updates, and deletes roadmap phases and milestones
  • Responds to surveys
Application Portfolio Manager
  • Creates and updates application portfolios
  • Adds applications to portfolios
  • Keeps track of application portfolios by reviewing the roadmaps, optimization reports, and portfolio analysis report
Application Portfolio Administrator
  • Assigns roles and permissions related to Application Portfolio Management
  • Defines and configures the workflow process for applications and optimizations
Application Analyst
  • Creates and updates surveys
  • Creates, updates, and deletes optimization records

Review the individual permission assignments for each role in Administration > MasterÂ Data > People > Roles.
